skills.name: Harvest
skills.description: Spell - Harvest the ground, poisoning enemies and restoring life.

skills.name: Infected Roots
skills.description: Spell - Grow poisonous roots that infect enemies.

skills.name: Barkskin
skills.description: Passive - The resiliency of nature imbues your flesh.

skills.name: Devouring Cloud
skills.description: Spell - Advancing contagion that creates deadly acid clouds on impact.

skills.name: Harvesters
skills.description: Summon - Ferocious plant creatures with a poison attack.

skills.name: Bloom
skills.description: Upgrade - Harvesters gain an aura that increases efficiency for the party.

skills.name: Growth
skills.description: Passive - Increased resistances make the Harvesters ripe for battle.

skills.name: Werebear Morph
skills.description: Morph - Transform into a deadly werebear with exceptional life and damage.

skills.name: Rend
skills.description: Attack - Impale your enemies on a burst of spines.

skills.name: Bestial Potency
skills.description: Upgrade - The magic pervading the Werebear form slows down your prey.

skills.name: Ravage
skills.description: Attack - Recklessly tear through an area causing death and destruction.

skills.name: Wildfire
skills.description: Melee Spell - Your unrelenting might burns as wildfire through demonic ranks.

skills.name: Primal Dominance
skills.description: Upgrade - Your bestial senses boost battle proficiency.

skills.name: Idol of Scosglen
skills.description: Buff - Transmutes the surrounding air into a layer of impervious stone.

skills.name: Ancestral Protection
skills.description: Upgrade - A blessing from Fiabla-Gear become unbreakable like the ridges of Scosglen under its cold storms.

skills.name: Hunger
skills.description: Passive - Recover lost life by eating your enemies.

skills.name: Ancestral Force
skills.description: Upgrade - A blessing from Bul-Kathos emit heavy shockwaves like the winds of Scosglen against its invaders.

skills.name: Werewolf Form
skills.description: Morph - Transform into a nocturnal hunter with savage melee abilities.

skills.name: Mana Pulse
skills.description: Attack - Gelid melee strike that restores mana and stamina.

skills.name: Ceaseless Fury
skills.description: Upgrade - A reduced cooldown enables a limitless ferociousness.

skills.name: Harbinger
skills.description: Warp Strike - Collide with prey in a surge of ravenous hunger.

skills.name: Feed the Pack
skills.description: Passive - Reanimate feral wolf spirits and heal your wounds.

skills.name: Twisted Claw
skills.description: Attack - Melee hit which unleashes a spiral of damaging twisters.

skills.name: Feral Escalation
skills.description: Passive - Adds deadly strike chance during wolf form, but causes your mana to drain even faster.

skills.name: Howl of the Spirits
skills.description: Buff - The feral call echoes in the fury of the hunt.

skills.name: Earth Talons
skills.description: Projectile - Create a wall of surging spikes below your preys.

skills.name: Wereowl Form
skills.description: Morph - Transform into a mythical creature with deadly capabilities.

skills.name: Charged Talons
skills.description: Upgrade - The sharp spikes puncture the enemy and shocks its body.

skills.name: Ferocity
skills.description: Upgrade - Your predatory instincts enhance your lethality.

skills.name: Raid
skills.description: Projecitle - Sever nearby enemies with a burst of angry birds.

skills.name: Egg Trap
skills.description: Projectile - Lay a fiery egg which hatches a flock of predatory birds.

skills.name: Steel Wings
skills.description: Upgrade - Increases your chance to block while in Wereowl Form.

skills.name: Progeny's Blessing
skills.description: Upgrade - Egg Traps empower you upon hatching.

skills.name: Steady Shot
skills.description: Projectile - Focuses the hunter for more complex shot.

skills.name: Cascade
skills.description: Projectile - Rains a volley of arrows on a large area.

skills.name: Erupting Strike
skills.description: Upgrade - Increases the fire damage of your hunter skills.

skills.name: Heartseeker
skills.description: Projectile - Magical homing arrows seek out your foes.

skills.name: Bear Companion
skills.description: Summon - Hunters are bonded to an animal from a young age.

skills.name: Primal Bond
skills.description: Passive - Increases weapon physical damage based on summon resists.

skills.name: Heart of the Pack
skills.description: Upgrade - The link with your companion manifests as a powerful party buff.

skills.name: Pathfinder
skills.description: Passive - Increases your damage and mobility.

skills.name: Tracking
skills.description: Passive - The expertise of an hunter traces your path to greater heights.

skills.name: Ember Spirit
skills.description: Spell - Set the path for the blind charge of a fiery spirit.

skills.name: Hunting Banshee
skills.description: Spell - An icy wraith tracks down nearby enemies.

skills.name: Pagan Rites
skills.description: Spell - Engulfs corpses in flames, healing you with each sacrifice.

skills.name: Rain of Fire
skills.description: Spell - Target enemy as a focus for a slowly expanding rain of embers.

skills.name: Spiritual Alignment
skills.description: Passive - Increases your fire and cold spell damage.

skills.name: Armageddon
skills.description: Buff - Rain meteors from the sky to obliterate your foes.

skills.name: Frigid Domain
skills.description: Buff - Conjure a field of frozen air that slows nearby enemies.

skills.name: Meditation
skills.description: Passive - Increases your maximum mana and mana regeneration.

skills.name: Purity
skills.description: Passive - Protects you against poison damage and curses.

skills.name: Melee Devotion
skills.description: Passive - A melee exclusive layer of damage protection.

skills.name: Freedom
skills.description: Passive - Increases defensive speeds and reduces chilled duration.

skills.name: Tenacity
skills.description: Passive - Increases physical resistance.

skills.name: Endurance
skills.description: Passive - Increases your maximum life.

skills.name: Continuity
skills.description: Passive - Increases the duration of your buff/debuff skills.

skills.name: Specialization
skills.description: Passive - Increases the skill cap of your activate [Non-Ultimate] Abilities.

skills.name: Chemistry
skills.description: Passive - Increases potion effectiveness compared to other sustain.

skills.name: Mythal
skills.description: Debuff - Field of wild magic that pierces resistances.

skills.name: Symbiosis
skills.description: Buff - Harmony with nature allows druids to develop the traits of Scosglen's wilderness.

skills.name: Vine Companion
skills.description: Special Summon - Invoke a poisonous ally that petrifies enemies and empowers you.

skills.name: Survival Instinct
skills.description: Passive - Survival in Harsh conditions has taught you well.

skills.name: Faerie Fire
skills.description: Buff - Protects you and leaves a trail of dazzling lights that damage enemies.

skills.name: Paragon of Fate
skills.description: Passive - High level bonuses tied to Heroic Library of Fate progression.

skills.name: Paragon of Sanctity
skills.description: Passive - High level bonuses tied to Heroic Duncraig progression.
